name: FbFmobileKit
summary: is the API Service for the Fulcrum Biometrics mobileKit iOS Library for API requests
description:
is the API Service for the Fulcrum Biometrics mobileKit iOS Library for API requests.
The library makes use of Alamofire as the HTTP Client to send requests to the following RESTful microservices:

OCR Server - for recognizing document visual zones, mainly text fields, through OCR and for document image normalizing
Trust Server - for evaluating the digital onboarding data by calculating the trust levels of five trust factors (#link)
Biometrics Server - for biometrics enrollment and processing
